metadata.title: CVE-2024-35925 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: prevent division by zero in blk_rq_stat_sum()The expression dst->nr_samples + src->nr_samples mayhave zero value on overflow. It is necessary to adda check to avoid division by zero.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with Svace.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
